Configure Project/Reference Directory

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Workfiles | Reference Directory) to set the following options:

  • The location of the reference directory.
  • Whether to keep a reference directory for each archive directory.
  • Whether to keep a reference directory for trunk revisions only.
  • Whether or not Version Manager write-protects the files in the reference directory.

Field Descriptions

Workfiles | Reference Directory
Reference Directory Enter the location of the reference Directory. You can enter a directory name and make it parallel to the archive directory structure by selecting the Keep a reference directory for each archive directory check box.
Keep a reference directory for each archive directory Select this check box to make the directory that you entered in the Reference Directory field parallel to the archive directory structure.
Reference directory for trunk revisions only Select this check box to maintain copies of tip revisions from the trunk only. Otherwise, Version Manager will maintain copies of tip revisions from both the trunk and any branches.
Make reference files read only Select this check box to write-protect the files in the reference directory.

See Also
